subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Sochi Olympics broke a Winter Games record as a Latvian hockey player, Ralfs Freibergs, became the eighth athlete disqualified for a positive doping test.
snippet: The Sochi Olympics broke a Winter Games record as a Latvian hockey player, Ralfs Freibergs, became the eighth athlete disqualified for a positive doping test.
